t = int(raw_input())
lis = []
for a in xrange(t):
        s = raw_input()
        #len = int(s)
        if len(s) == 0:
          lis.append(len(s))
          continue
        lent = int(s)
        """if lent == 1:
          lis.append(1)"""
        if lent % 2 == 0:
          lis.append(lent)
        else:
          lis.append(lent - 1)
for a in xrange(t):
        print (lis[a])
